item.title: 彭博新闻报道，联合健康集团将员工薪资涨幅上限设定为2%
item.description: 据彭博社周五报道，知情人士透露，联合健康集团今年将员工加薪幅度限制在0%至2%之间，具体数额取决于个人绩效表现。【原文：UnitedHealth Group has limited employee pay raises this year to between 0% and 2%, depending on performance, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 玩具制造商孩之宝加入企业行列，就《国际紧急经济权力法》关税支付问题起诉美国政府
item.description: 玩具制造商孩之宝公司周五加入了数百家企业的行列，要求退还根据特朗普总统紧急贸易措施缴纳的关税。法庭文件显示，美国最高法院上周裁定该措施违法。【原文：Toymaker Hasbro on Friday joined hundreds of companies suing for refunds of tariffs paid under President Donald Trump’s emergency trade measures, which were deemed illegal by the U.S. Supreme Court last week, according to court documents.】

item.title: 特朗普提名的美联储主席人选面临阻碍，鲍威尔任期倒计时已启动
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普尚未正式提名凯文·沃什接替杰罗姆·鲍威尔担任美联储主席。这种延迟虽非前所未有，但也不太常见，加剧了人们对美联储可能受到政治压力影响的担忧，使这一过程蒙上阴影。【原文：President Donald Trump has yet to formally nominate Kevin Warsh to succeed Jerome Powell as head of the Federal Reserve, a delay that while not unprecedented is also not typical and adds to uncertainty in a process clouded by concerns about political pressure on the U.S. central bank.】

item.title: 默克公司因加德西尔疫苗销量下滑，将在美国工厂裁员约150人
item.description: 默克公司本周在北卡罗来纳州数据库提交的通知显示，该公司位于该州的工厂将裁减约150名员工。该工厂主要生产人乳头瘤病毒疫苗加德西尔。【原文：Merck will lay off about 150 employees across its facility in North Carolina that manufactures its human papillomavirus vaccine, Gardasil, according to a notice filed in the state's database this week.】

item.title: 摩根大通、巴克莱、第五第三银行因未察觉Tricolor的"重大警示信号"遭投资者起诉
item.description: 摩根大通、巴克莱银行和第五第三银行遭到投资者起诉，这些投资者因投资已破产的次级汽车贷款机构Tricolor发行的证券蒙受损失。原告指控这些银行在欺诈性推销债务时未能察觉"重大警示信号"。【原文：JPMorgan Chase , Barclays and Fifth Third have been sued by investors who suffered losses on securities issued by now-bankrupt subprime auto lender Tricolor, and accused the banks of missing "giant red flags" when fraudulently marketing the debt.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰风波加剧美国2万亿美元私募信贷领域的压力
item.description: 规模达2万亿美元的私营信贷行业，过去十年间从为杠杆收购提供融资，逐步拓展至银行主导的领域。如今，随着主要私营贷款机构蓝猫资本的动荡，该行业正面临新的压力。【原文：The $2 trillion private credit industry, which has expanded over the past decade from financing leveraged buyouts to areas banks dominated, is facing fresh strain from turmoil at Blue Owl Capital, a major private lender.】

item.title: 特拉华州最高法院维持近期公司法全面修订
item.description: 特拉华州最高法院周五维持了一项2025年颁布的法律，该法律全面修订了该州广泛适用的公司法典，旨在限制针对商业巨头提起的诉讼。反对者将此法案称为"亿万富翁法案"。【原文：The Delaware Supreme Court upheld on Friday a 2025 law that overhauled the state's widely used corporate code to limit lawsuits against powerful business leaders, a measure that opponents had dubbed the "billionaire's bill."】

item.title: 巴西河港大豆卡车排成长龙，创纪录收成出口受阻
item.description: 巴西卡车司机在亚马逊雨林的米里蒂图巴港口码头运送大豆时遭遇了异常漫长的延误。由于创纪录的约1.8亿公吨大豆产量，这个全球主要大豆出口枢纽之一的物流系统已不堪重负。【原文：Truck drivers in Brazil are facing unusually long delays to deliver soybeans at the Miritituba port terminal in the Amazon rainforest, as a record harvest of approximately 180 million metric tons overwhelms logistics at one of the world's key export hubs for the crop.】

item.title: 塔吉特管理层面临抨击，投资者呼吁变革
item.description: 过去三年间，零售商塔吉特因商品选择和政策决策遭到消费者强烈质疑，承受了巨大压力。【原文：Over the last three years, retailer Target has weathered intense criticism from consumers who have questioned its merchandise choices and policy decisions.】

item.title: 加州现已成为派拉蒙收购华纳兄弟的最大障碍
item.description: 若派拉蒙与天空舞公司收购华纳兄弟探索公司，加州将蒙受重大损失，并可能阻挠交易达成；而派拉蒙与特朗普政府深厚的政治联系，预计将为获得联邦监管机构批准铺平道路。【原文：California has a lot to lose if Paramount Skydance buys Warner Bros Discovery and could stand in the way of a deal, while Paramount's deep political connections to the Trump administration are expected to smooth the path to federal regulatory approval.】

item.title: 墨西哥国家石油公司报告第四季度净亏损862万美元
item.description: 墨西哥国家能源公司佩梅克斯周五向墨西哥证券交易所提交的文件显示，该公司去年第四季度净亏损1.5523亿比索（约合862万美元），收入为3624.5亿比索。【原文：Mexican state energy company Pemex booked a net loss of 155.23 million pesos ($8.62 million) and revenues of 362.45 billion pesos for the fourth quarter of last year, a filing with the Mexican stock exchange on Friday showed.】

item.title: 遭AI伪造内容攻击的西班牙女权主义者呼吁加强网络监管
item.description: 一名遭受网络暴力（包括人工智能生成的虚假裸照）的西班牙女性权益活动家表示，政府承诺监管社交媒体的力度还远远不够。她呼吁追溯匿名账户的来源，以终结数字暴力行为的有罪不罚现象。【原文：A Spanish women's rights activist who suffered online abuse, including AI-generated fake nude images, said the government's pledge to regulate social media does not go far enough, calling for anonymous accounts to be made traceable to end impunity for digital violence.】

item.title: 墨西哥Televisa集团取消派息，股价下跌
item.description: 墨西哥广播公司Televisa集团的股价周五早盘跌幅扩大至6.5%，因该公司宣布取消2026年度的常规股息派发。【原文：Shares in Mexican broadcaster Grupo Televisa extended losses to 6.5% on Friday morning, as the company canceled its regular dividend for 2026.】

item.title: 美国12月建筑支出增幅符合预期
item.description: 美国12月建筑支出有所增长，这得益于独栋住宅建设反弹以及房屋翻新持续强劲的势头。【原文：U.S. construction spending increased in December, lifted by a rebound in single-family homebuilding as well as ongoing strength in home renovations.】

item.title: 龙舌兰酒巨头贝克利因美国业务重组及需求萎缩，2026年业绩预期走弱
item.description: 墨西哥酒厂贝克莱——全球最大的龙舌兰酒生产商——在重组其美国分销网络之际，警告称2026年将面临艰难局面。当前烈酒需求萎缩，贸易环境动荡不安。【原文：Mexican distiller Becle , the world's largest tequila maker, warned of a difficult 2026 as it restructures its distribution network in the United States amid shrinking demand for hard liquor and a turbulent trade environment.】

item.title: 英国影院谨慎认可派拉蒙在华纳兄弟竞购战中的胜出
item.description: 英国影院谨慎欢迎派拉蒙与天空舞影业在收购华纳兄弟探索公司的竞争中击败奈飞，但仍担忧好莱坞制片厂合并可能导致裁员并减少院线电影发行数量。【原文：British cinemas cautiously welcomed Paramount Skydance beating Netflix in the race to buy Warner Bros Discovery, but remained concerned that combining the Hollywood studios could cost jobs and reduce the number of movies released in theatres.】

item.title: 瑞士可再生能源公司ThomasLloyd计划在美国公开上市
item.description: 瑞士可再生能源公司ThomasLloyd Climate Solutions周五宣布，计划在美国上市，并已同意与一家已在美国上市的特殊目的收购公司（SPAC）合并。【原文：Swiss renewable energy company ThomasLloyd Climate Solutions plans to go public in the United States and has agreed a merger with an acquisition vehicle, or SPAC, already listed there, it said on Friday.】

item.title: OpenAI的1100亿美元融资轮获得亚马逊、英伟达、软银的投资
item.description: OpenAI周五宣布，该公司正进行一轮规模达1100亿美元的融资，这轮融资将使ChatGPT开发商的估值达到8400亿美元。该交易凸显了人工智能领域投资的热潮。【原文：OpenAI said on Friday it is raising $110 billion in a blockbuster funding round that would value the ChatGPT maker at $840 billion, in a deal that signals the feverish pace of investment in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 彭博社报道，贝莱德旗下全球基础设施部门与EQT集团即将收购AES公司
item.description: 彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士消息报道称，贝莱德旗下全球基础设施合伙公司与私募股权公司EQT AB正就收购美国公用事业公司AES Corp进行深入谈判。【原文：BlackRock-owned Global Infrastructure Partners and equity firm EQT AB are in advanced talks to acquire U.S.-based utility AES Corp , Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 洞察：沙特阿美将页岩气革命带入阿拉伯沙漠
item.description: 使美国成为世界头号石油生产国的页岩革命，正在阿拉伯沙漠中初具规模。【原文：The shale revolution that made the United States the world's top oil producer is taking shape in the Arabian Desert.】

item.title: 小米在中国发生电动汽车事故后成立安全咨询委员会
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商小米公司周五表示，将成立顾问委员会评估其汽车安全性，以应对近期频发事故引发的批评声浪。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xiaomi said on Friday that it will set up a committee of advisers to assess the safety of its cars, as it moves to combat rising criticism over a recent spate of accidents.】

item.title: 比利时监管机构对谷歌在线广告定价行为展开调查
item.description: 比利时竞争监管机构周五表示，已就谷歌在线广告销售业务展开调查。【原文：Belgium's competition watchdog said on Friday it had opened an investigation into the sale of online ads by Google .】

item.title: 美国1月生产者价格涨幅超预期
item.description: 美国1月份生产者价格涨幅超出预期，这可能是企业将进口关税带来的成本上涨转嫁给了消费者，表明未来几个月通胀可能加速上升。【原文：U.S. producer prices increased more than expected in January, likely as businesses passed on higher costs from import tariffs, suggesting inflation could pick up in the months ahead.】

item.title: OpenAI的1100亿美元融资轮获得亚马逊、英伟达、软银的投资
item.description: OpenAI周五宣布，该公司正进行一轮规模达1100亿美元的融资，这轮融资将使ChatGPT制造商的估值达到8400亿美元。该交易凸显了人工智能领域投资的热潮。【原文：OpenAI said on Friday it is raising $110 billion in a blockbuster funding round that would value the ChatGPT maker at $840 billion, in a deal that signals the feverish pace of investment in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 推特股价飙升，多尔西倚重人工智能裁员
item.description: 周五，Block股价飙升逾16%，此前这家金融科技公司宣布将裁员近半数，作为全面改革计划的一部分，旨在将人工智能工具融入其所有业务运营。【原文：Block shares soared more than 16% on Friday after the fintech firm announced it would nearly halve its workforce as part of an overhaul to embed artificial intelligence tools across its operations.】

item.title: 科瑞维股价暴跌，资本支出翻倍引发利润率担忧
item.description: CoreWeave股价周五盘前暴跌约12%，此前该公司宣布计划将今年资本支出翻倍，引发投资者对其利润率压力及人工智能战略实际回报的担忧。【原文：Shares of CoreWeave slumped around 12% before the bell on Friday, after the company's plans to double capital expenditure this year fueled investor concerns about margin pressure and effective returns from its artificial intelligence push.】

item.title: 露露柠檬创始人威尔逊加码代理权争夺战，敦促提名更多董事
item.description: 露露乐蒙创始人奇普·威尔逊周五在致股东的信中表示，他提议更换这家运动休闲品牌的三名以上董事，此举加剧了他此前发起的代理权争夺战。【原文：Lululemon Athletica founder Chip Wilson has proposed to replace more than three directors at the athleisure maker, he said in a letter to shareholders on Friday, ramping up his earlier proxy fight.】

item.title: 阿尔巴尼亚如何未能成功封禁TikTok
item.description: 社交媒体平台TikTok在本月一年禁令到期后重返阿尔巴尼亚。这一事件凸显了在政治分裂地区实施禁令的复杂性，并引发了对网络安全和审查制度的质疑。【原文：Social media platform TikTok is back in Albania after a year-long ban expired this month, in a case illustrating the complexity of imposing bans in a politically fragmented region and sparking questions over online safety and censorship.】

item.title: 目标在五月底前从谷物食品中去除人工色素
item.description: 塔吉特公司周五宣布，将在五月底前仅销售不含经认证合成色素的谷物产品，成为最新一家在人工色素整治浪潮中收紧标准的零售商。【原文：Target said on Friday it would sell only cereals made without certified synthetic colors by the end of May, becoming the latest retailer to tighten standards amid a crackdown on artificial dyes.】

item.title: 戴尔股价飙升，因其预测人工智能服务器收入将翻倍
item.description: 戴尔科技股价周五盘前交易中大幅上涨，此前该公司预测其人工智能服务器业务在2027财年的营收将翻倍，凸显出人工智能基础设施需求的激增。【原文：Shares of Dell Technologies jumped in premarket trading on Friday after the company forecast revenue from its AI server business will double in fiscal 2027, underscoring surging demand for infrastructure catering to artificial intelligence.】
